remarks: The converse of ~ galactghm .  The uncurrying of a homomorphism into ` ( SymGrp `` Y ) ` is a group action.  Thus, group actions and group homomorphisms into a symmetric group are essentially equivalent notions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jan-2015.)
